Package algorithms.imageProcessing.matching

Class ShapeFinder2

java.lang.Object
algorithms.imageProcessing.matching.ShapeFinder2
public class ShapeFinder2 extends Object
NOTE: not ready for use. was an experiment before segmentation was improved with MSER and before started using HOGs. This will be re-done with the better segmentation and then the better segmentation + HOGs, HCPT, color histograms, etc. The current MSER matcher uses everything except shape. uses PartialShapeMatcher and search patterns to find the best fitting match between a group of adjacent segmented cells to a template shape. Any additional information that helps limit the search should be done before this stage and included or excluded in the adjacency map. Also note that the class uses internal cache which requires single threaded use of this class.
Author:
nichole

  • Constructor Details

    • ShapeFinder2

      public ShapeFinder2(algorithms.util.PairIntArray bounds1, float scale1, float sz1, int xMax1, int yMax1, gnu.trove.map.TIntObjectMap<Set<algorithms.util.PairInt>> mapOfSets2, float scale2, Map<algorithms.util.OneDIntArray,algorithms.util.PairIntArray> keyBoundsMap, int xMax2, int yMax2)
      NOT READY FOR USE. note that this is the data of one image in pyramid1 compared to the data in one image of pyramid2 and it is assumed that one such pair will have template and true match of nearly the same scale. On other words, this instance of ShapeFinder might not hold the true match at same scale, but another instance (holding other scles of the pyramids) should if the true match is present.
      Parameters:
      bounds1 - clockwise ordered boundaries of template object.
      ch1 - 1-D color histogram of template object
      scale1 - a bookkeeping number for the octave downsampling scale factor with respect to the complete pyramid1.
      mapOfSets2 - labeled point sets of dataset2 to be searched for template
      scale2 - a bookkeeping number for the octave downsampling scale factor with respect to the complete pyramid2.
      keyIndexMap - an in/out variable for use in combination wtth indexBoundsMap to cache the clockwise boundaries of aggregated adjacent labeled cells. The key = sorted keys of mapOfSets2, value = the lookup key for indexBoundsMap,
      indexBoundsMap - an in/out variable for use in combination wtth keyIndexMap to cache the clockwise boundaries of aggregated adjacent labeled cells. The key = the lookup key from keyIndexMap, value = clockwise ordered bounding points of the aggregated sets of labels from the key in indexBoundsMap,

  • Method Details

    • findAggregated

      public ShapeFinder2.ShapeFinderResult findAggregated()
      NOT READY FOR USE. uses PartialShapeMatcher and search patterns to find the best fitting match between a group of adjacent segmented cells to a template shape. Editing this now... the code no longer checks for a restricted distance or size in aggregating the labeled regions - it's up to the user to filter the input sets given to this instance themselves for those purposes. The runtime is dependent upon which of the 3 search patterns is kept in the end, so that will be filled in here after implementation and testing.
      Returns:

Editing this now... the code no longer checks for a restricted distance or size in aggregating the labeled regions - it's up to the user to filter the input sets given to this instance themselves for those purposes.
